column1: I am standing in the garden. I walk to the kitchen and pick up a cup, then walk to the living room. I pick place a ball in the cup. I carry the cup to the hall and turn it upside down. I walk to the kitchen, fill the cup with water, then go back out to the garden. Where is the ball?
